title: Couple in Battery Park, July Fourth, New York City
marks:
Signature; Title; Edition

in pencil, bottom edg in pencil, LRC on back: [Toby Old 1986]
description: seated blonde woman holding a Lady Liberty torch flashlight in her PR hand and a small US flag in her PL hand, wearing shorts, a halter top and cap of fabric with stars and stripes pattern; man seated behind her wearing a werewolf mask; other figures standing and seated in background
creditline: Gift of the Artist, by exchange
